io.micronaut.runtime.server.restart

Class DevelopmentRestartWatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.runtime.server.restart.DevelopmentRestartWatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifeCycle<DevelopmentRestartWatch>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @Requires(property="micronaut.server.watch.enabled",value="true",defaultValue="false") @Requires(beans=EmbeddedServer.class)
 @Context
public class DevelopmentRestartWatch
extends Object
implements LifeCycle<DevelopmentRestartWatch>
    Simple watch service that simply stops the server if any changes occur. It is up to an external tool to restart the server.

    For example with Gradle you use ./gradlew run --continuous

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
